Class PatientAppointmentView

java.lang.Object
appointmentsystem.PatientAppointmentView
All Implemented Interfaces:
patientViewAppointment
public class PatientAppointmentView extends Object implements patientViewAppointment
The PatientAppointmentView class provides functionalities for patients to view available appointment slots and check the status of their scheduled appointments. It interacts with the CSV file to retrieve appointment data. This class implements the patientViewAppointment interface.

  • Method Details

    • viewAppointmentSlots

      public void viewAppointmentSlots()
      Displays a list of all available appointment slots that are unreserved. Each slot shows details such as the appointment ID, date, time slot, doctor name, and current status.
      Specified by:
      viewAppointmentSlots in interface patientViewAppointment

    • viewAppointmentStatus

      public void viewAppointmentStatus(String patientId)
      Displays the scheduled appointments for a specific patient. Each appointment displays details such as appointment ID, date, time slot, doctor ID, doctor name, and status.
      Specified by:
      viewAppointmentStatus in interface patientViewAppointment
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient whose appointments are to be viewed.
